# oscillation

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

For the moment, the goal of oscillation is to be a sandbox for exploration of the code in Oscope. The original code of oscillation results from a fork of the Bioconductor git repository of [Oscope](https://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/Oscope.html).

## Installation

To install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ramiromagno/oscillation")
```
